survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Plant-Based Meat Alternatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights into consumer preferences, perceptions, and purchasing behaviors regarding plant-based meat alternatives.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based meat alternatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly design.

script.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based meat alternatives?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase plant-based meat alternatives? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select options. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase plant-based meat alternatives? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the taste of plant-based meat alternatives compared to traditional meat?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the taste of plant-based meat alternatives compared to traditional meat?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based meat alternatives?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based meat alternatives?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for plant-based meat alternatives that are more sustainable?
answer_options: Maybe, depending on the price difference
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include a neutral option ('Maybe') to capture uncertainty.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for plant-based meat alternatives that are more sustainable?
answer_options: Maybe, depending on the price difference
